mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guomai_commodity(commodity_id, commodity_type, commodity_name, commodity_price, commodity_bonus, block_flag, create_time) VALUES (#{commodityId}, #{type, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{commodityName}, #{commodityPrice}, #{commodityBonus}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})
